module.title: glottonyms
module.p: Glottonyms are names identifying languages and dialects.
Like other kinds of name, glottonyms can be classified into two distinct grammatical types –

ul.li: glottonymic proper nouns eg. Laideann Latin
glottonymic name-descriptions eg. A’ Ghreugais Greek, Gàidhlig na h-Èireann Irish
